satellite.heading: Satẹlaiti
satellite.specs:
Awọn iwọn: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube
Iwọn: 245 gr
Awọn ohun elo: aluminiomu, goolu, gilaasi, ati awọn paati itanna.
Orbit: Giga 525 ± 25 km; tẹri: SSO 97,6 ± 0,1 °
Olupilẹṣẹ: PSLV (Ọkọ Ifilọlẹ Satẹlaiti Polar) ti ISRO ṣiṣẹ

antenna.heading: Eriali / ere
antenna.specs:
Awọn iwọn: 6 m (iwọn ila opin) ati 1.2m (giga)
Iwọn: 46 kg
Ohun elo: aluminiomu, iposii mirrored ọkọ, goolu aluminiomu dome daduro nipasẹ kan scaffolding be.

radio.heading: Redio alaye lẹkunrẹrẹ
radio.specs:
Isalẹ: 468,5 MHz
Awoṣe: CSS
Bandiwidi: TBD
